alert.note: Alert for Cass; Harrison; Marion (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 2:34AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Hempstead, southeastern Miller, Lafayette and Nevada Counties, northwestern Caddo and northwestern Bossier Parishes, eastern Marion, southeastern Cass and northeastern Harrison Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 234 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Little Missouri Falls Recreation Area to near Texarkana to near Harleton. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Marshall, Hope, Prescott, Stamps, Lewisville, Vivian, Blanchard, Waskom, Benton, Plain Dealing, Oil City, Fouke, Mooringsport, Bradley, Emmet, Hosston, Blevins, Buckner and Perrytown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
